meanings.definition: Move up and down in a quick, jerky motion.
meanings.sent1: The cork was bobbing in the water.
meanings.sent2: She was bobbing her head to the music.
meanings.sent3: The toy duck was bobbing happily in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The buoy was bobbing like a dancer on the waves.
meanings.sent5: The fishing float was bobbing eagerly, waiting for a bite.

meanings.definition: Cut hair short, typically in a blunt style.
meanings.sent1: She decided to bob her hair for a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to bob his hair for easy maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The barber accidentally bobbed her hair too short.
meanings.sent4: Her new hairstyle bobbed her confidence up.
meanings.sent5: Bobbing her hair made her feel lighter and free.

meanings.definition: A quick, jerky movement up and down.
meanings.sent1: The bobbing of the boat made her feel queasy.
meanings.sent2: The bobbing of the buoy indicated rough waters ahead.
meanings.sent3: The bobbing of the balloon caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The bobbing of the puppy's tail showed its excitement.
meanings.sent5: The bobbing of the dancer's head added flair to the performance.
